page.title: 10HOUSING
page.content: Tunstall is a small village with 37 houses and 9 farms.Its only amenity is the church end church hall.The villagers must travel to Roos or Withernsea for their shopping.There is a distinct contrast between the village of Tunstall and its main attraction:the Caravan Site at Sand le Mere.The site has permanent and touring caravans,a camp shop,a resturant,fish and chip shop, and a nightclub/pub.Most tourists appear in the summer months but some use the site for weekend stays all year round. The beach is the other attraction at Tunstall being only half a mile from the village.The cliffs are clay and in many places they have been eroded.The main employment in Tunstall is farming.
